sourcesContent:
const projectData = [
{	
	path: "/manage",
	heading: "Manage",
	description: `This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs 
  provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that 
  required interactivity, such as the testimonial slider.`,
  skills: "Interaction Design / Front End Development",
  languages: "HTML / CSS / JS",
  background: `This project was a front-end  challenge from Frontend Mentor. It’s a platform that 
  enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge 
  includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different 
  screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve 
  real-world coding problems. I’ve learned something new with each project, helping 
  me to improve and adapt my style.`,

	heroMobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-hero.jpg",
	heroMobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-manage-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroTabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-hero.jpg",
	heroTabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-manage-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroDesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-hero.jpg",
	heroDesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-manage-preview-2@2x.jpg"
},
{
	path: "/bookmark",
	heading: "Bookmark",
	description: `This project required me to build a fully responsive landing page to the designs 
  provided. I used HTML5, along with CSS Grid and JavaScript for the areas that 
  required interactivity, such as the features section.`,
  skills: "Interaction Design / Front End Development",
  languages: "HTML / CSS / JS",
  background: `This project was a front-end  challenge from Frontend Mentor. It’s a platform that 
  enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge 
  includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different 
  screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve 
  real-world coding problems. I’ve learned something new with each project, helping 
  me to improve and adapt my style.`,

	heroMobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-hero.jpg",
	heroMobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-bookmark-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroTabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-hero.jpg",
	heroTabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-bookmark-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroDesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-hero.jpg",
	heroDesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-bookmark-preview-2@2x.jpg"
},
{
	path: "/insure",
	heading: "Insure",
	description: `This was a small project which mostly consisted of HTML and CSS. I built a 
  fully-responsive landing page. The only JavaScript this project required was 
  to enable the toggling of the mobile navigation.`,
  skills: "Interaction Design / Front End Development",
  languages: "HTML / CSS / JS",
  background: `This project was a front-end  challenge from Frontend Mentor. It’s a platform that 
  enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge 
  includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different 
  screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve 
  real-world coding problems. I’ve learned something new with each project, helping 
  me to improve and adapt my style.`,

	heroMobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-hero.jpg",
	heroMobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-insure-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroTabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-hero.jpg",
	heroTabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-insure-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroDesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-hero.jpg",
	heroDesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-insure-preview-2@2x.jpg"
},
{
	path: "/fylo",
	heading: "Fylo",
	description: `This project was built in pure HTML and CSS. I had mobile and desktop designs to 
  work to and built it so that it was fully-responsive. I took a mobile-first approach 
  and used modern CSS like Flexbox and Grid for layout purposes.`,
  skills: "Interaction Design / Front End Development",
  languages: "HTML / CSS",
  background: `This project was a front-end  challenge from Frontend Mentor. It’s a platform that 
  enables you to practice building websites to a design and project brief. Each challenge 
  includes mobile and desktop designs to show how the website should look at different 
  screen sizes. Creating these projects has helped me refine my workflow and solve 
  real-world coding problems. I’ve learned something new with each project, helping 
  me to improve and adapt my style.`,

	heroMobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-hero.jpg",
	heroMobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2MobileSm: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2MobileLg: "./assets/images/detail/mobile/image-fylo-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroTabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-hero.jpg",
	heroTabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2TabletSm: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2TabletLg: "./assets/images/detail/tablet/image-fylo-preview-2@2x.jpg",

	heroDesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-hero.jpg",
	heroDesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-hero@2x.jpg",
	preview1DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-preview-1.jpg",
	preview1DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-preview-1@2x.jpg",
	preview2DesktopSm: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-preview-2.jpg",
	preview2DesktopLg: "./assets/images/detail/desktop/image-fylo-preview-2@2x.jpg"
}]

export default projectData
